title: Apple has somehow found a way to fix Face ID without replacing the whole iPhone
content:
Apple is preparing to make a major change to the Face ID repair process on iPhone 12 and newer, according to a new report. This change will allow Apple Stores and Apple Authorized Service Providers to repair Face ID without having to replace the entire iPhone itself.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple has somehow found a way to fix Face ID without replacing the whole iPhone appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Face ID repairs are about to get a whole lot easier. Apple is rolling out a new part that allows module repairs.
